ul.li: Core Membship: Hound, Beryl Coronet, Norwood Builder, Abbey Grange, Intrepid
Primary Goal: Collect as much intelligence information as possible
First Appearance: Enforcers Inc. Vol II #?

section.title: Description
section.p: A British intel organization that is not affilated with any known government. While the Baker Street Irregulars are known to sell their information, they do so only to trusted partners.

section.title: History
section.p: The Baker Street Irregulars maintain a low-profile, but were very helpful in giving Intrepid some intel on the Fey when the Enforcers were investigating the Faerie and their connection to the magic-tech hybrid.
Alan Arsenault create the Baker Street Irregulars
